How It Works

Get started in just 3 simple steps

1

Sign Up

Create your account using your phone number. Quick OTP verification ensures security.

2

Complete Profile

Add your details - age, income, occupation. Our smart system matches you with eligible schemes.

3

Apply & Benefit

Browse eligible schemes, get step-by-step guidance, and apply directly through official portals.
